name.baseName: Rare earth roasting;dysprosium;Bastnaesite/Monazite (B/M);Rare Earth Elements (REE) containing ore
稀土焙烧;镝;B/M;含稀土矿石

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: Dysprosium, obtained from rare earth roasting processes in the designated regions, is a key material for manufacturing high-strength permanent magnets used in various advanced technological applications such as electric vehicles, wind turbines, and high-efficiency electrical motors. It is also utilized in nuclear reactors, as well as in the production of laser materials and commercial lighting.
从指定地区稀土焙烧工艺中获得的镝，是制造用于各种高技术应用的高强度永磁体的关键材料，如电动汽车、风力涡轮机和高效电动机。它也被用于核反应堆，以及激光材料和商业照明的生产。

quantitativeReference.functionalUnitOrOther: The goal of this investigation is to compare environmental impacts related to the production of 1 kg Dy (functional unit) from IAC (Southern China), from B/M ore (Bayan Obo), and from an eudialyte deposit (Norra Kärr) using the LCA method

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: The goal of this investigation is to compare environmental impacts related to the production of 1 kg Dy (functional unit) from IAC (Southern China), from B/M ore (Bayan Obo), and from an eudialyte deposit (Norra Kärr) using the LCA method
本次调查的目的是比较 IAC（中国南方）、B/M 矿石（白云鄂博）和 eudialyte 矿床（Norra Kärr）生产 1 千克镝（功能单位）的环境影响，使用生命周期分析法
technology.technologicalApplicability: Dysprosium, obtained from rare earth roasting processes in the designated regions, is a key material for manufacturing high-strength permanent magnets used in various advanced technological applications such as electric vehicles, wind turbines, and high-efficiency electrical motors. It is also utilized in nuclear reactors, as well as in the production of laser materials and commercial lighting.
从指定地区稀土焙烧工艺中获得的镝，是制造用于各种高技术应用的高强度永磁体的关键材料，如电动汽车、风力涡轮机和高效电动机。它也被用于核反应堆，以及激光材料和商业照明的生产。

LCIMethodAndAllocation.deviationsFromLCIMethodApproaches: In this study, an allocation method based on the mass of produced REEs combined with their market prices (based on an international metals market analysis and pricing index company ) are considered, as usual for metals with strongly different prices. As the ores have different compositions, the allocation factor has to be assessed individually for each site.

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Zapp, P., Marx, J., Schreiber, A., Friedrich, B. & Voßenkaul, D. Comparison of dysprosium production from different resources by life cycle assessment. Resources, Conservation and Recycling 130, 248–259 (2018).

Zapp, P., Marx, J., Schreiber, A., Friedrich, B. & Voßenkaul, D. Comparison of dysprosium production from different resources by life cycle assessment. Resources, Conservation and Recycling 130, 248–259 (2018).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: Users of this data set should pay attention to the mass-based allocation method used to assess the environmental impacts associated with the production of dysprosium, which accounts for the varied market prices and composition of different rare earth ores. The allocation factor for the environmental impacts must be calculated individually for each mining site due to their unique ore compositions. It is essential to regularly update the input data concerning international metals market prices and any changes in ore composition to ensure accurate life cycle assessment results.
使用此数据集的用户应注意用于评估与镝生产相关的环境影响的基于质量的分配方法，该方法考虑了不同稀土矿石的多样化市场价格和成分。由于每个矿区的矿石成分都是独特的，所以必须为每个采矿场地单独计算环境影响的分配系数。为了确保生命周期评估结果的准确性，必须定期更新有关国际金属市场价格的输入数据和任何矿石成分的变化。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
